萖萖萖

萖字的基本解释

萖
wǎn
“莞”的讹字。

萖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guān］
［《廣韻》古丸切，平桓，見。］
［《廣韻》胡官切，平桓，匣。］
亦作“萖1”。
(1)俗名水葱、席子草。亦指用莞草织的席子。
(2)姓。春秋时有莞苏。见《吕氏春秋》。
[②]［wǎn］
［《廣韻》户板切，上潸，匣。］
微笑貌。
[③]［guàn］
［《集韻》古玩切，去换，見。］
亦作“萖3”。
地名用字。晋置东莞郡。见《晋书·地理志下》。
[④]［guǎn］
亦作“萖4”。
地名用字。今有东莞市。在广东省东江下游。

萖字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　萖； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1042第25
【字彙補】音未詳。【博雅】萖，笑也。

萖字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
萖字的起名意思

暂无。

Cricket
Basic explanation of words
Cricket
wǎn
The corruption of "wan".
Cricket
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guān］
["Guangyun" Guwan cut, Pinghuan, see you. ]
["Guangyun" Hu Guanqie, Pinghuan, Xie. ]
Also known as "萖1".
(1) The common name is water spring onion and mat grass. Also refers to a mat woven with Wancao.
(2) Last name. There is Wansu in the Spring and Autumn Period. See "Lu Shi Chun Qiu".
[②]［wǎn］
["Guangyun" household board cut, Shanglu, box. ]
Smiling appearance.
[③]［guàn］
["Jiyun" antiques cut, go and change, see you. ]
Also known as "萖3".
Place names in words. Jin set up Dongguan County. See "Book of Jin·Geography II".
[④]［guǎn］
Also known as "萖4".
Place names in words. Today there is Dongguan City. In the lower reaches of the Dongjiang River in Guangdong Province.
Cricket
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　萖; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1042 Page 25
[Vocabulary complement] The sound is not specified. [Bo Ya] Laugh, laugh.
